verses.verse: וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ve-ya-'a-Ko And Jacob הָלַ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach went לְדַרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> le-dar-Ko; on his way וַיִּפְגְּעוּ־ <S%H6293><s%> vai-yif-ge-'u- met ב֖וֹ vo מַלְאֲכֵ֥י <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chei and the angels אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer he said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And when Jacob כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he רָאָ֔ם <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Am, saw them מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh host אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him This [is] God's זֶ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh; This וַיִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and he called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he מַֽחֲנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4266><s%> Ma-cha-Na-yim. Mahanaim פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יַעֲקֹ֤ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob מַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers לְפָנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav, before him אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav to Esau אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv; his brother אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah unto the land שֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir of Seir שְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> se-Deh the country אֱדֽוֹם׃ <S%H123><s%> e-Dom. of Edom

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav And he commanded אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, them saying כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus תֹאמְר֔וּן <S%H559><s%> tom-Run, Thus shall ye speak לַֽאדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni unto my lord לְעֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> le-'e-Sav; Esau כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith עַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-de-Cha Thy servant יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with לָבָ֣ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van with Laban גַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1481><s%> Gar-ti, thus I have sojourned וָאֵחַ֖ר <S%H309><s%> va-'e-Char and stayed there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until עָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> 'At-tah. now

וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- have לִי֙ li שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor And I have oxen וַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-Mor, and asses צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon flocks וְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> ve-'E-ved and menservants וְשִׁפְחָ֑ה <S%H8198><s%> ve-shif-Chah; and womenservants וָֽאֶשְׁלְחָה֙ <S%H7971><s%> va-'esh-le-Chah and I have sent לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid to tell לַֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni, my lord לִמְצֹא־ <S%H4672><s%> lim-tzo- that I may find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha. in thy sight

וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shu-vu returned הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> ham-mal-'a-Chim, And the messengers אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko to Jacob לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying בָּ֤אנוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-nu We came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha to thy brother אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, Esau וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam and furthermore הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech and also he cometh לִקְרָֽאתְךָ֔ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-te-Cha, to meet thee וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba'- and four מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot and four hundred אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo. with

וַיִּירָ֧א <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-Ra afraid יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Then Jacob מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od was greatly וַיֵּ֣צֶר <S%H3334><s%> vai-Ye-tzer and distressed ל֑וֹ lo; וַיַּ֜חַץ <S%H2673><s%> vai-Ya-chatz and he divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַצֹּ֧אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon that [was] with him and the flocks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar and herds וְהַגְּמַלִּ֖ים <S%H1581><s%> ve-hag-ge-mal-Lim and the camels לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei into two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Not. bands

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo come עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav If Esau אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh company הָאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat to the one וְהִכָּ֑הוּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-Ka-hu; and smite it וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah then הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh then the other company הַנִּשְׁאָ֖ר <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'Ar which is left לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <S%H6413><s%> lif-lei-Tah. shall escape

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer said יַעֲקֹב֒ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֱלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei O God אָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi of my father אַבְרָהָ֔ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham, Abraham וֵאלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei and God אָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi of my father יִצְחָ֑ק <S%H3327><s%> yitz-Chak; Isaac יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD הָאֹמֵ֣ר <S%H559><s%> ha-'o-Mer which saidst אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me שׁ֧וּב <S%H7725><s%> shuv unto me Return לְאַרְצְךָ֛ <S%H776><s%> le-'ar-tze-Cha unto thy country וּלְמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <S%H4138><s%> u-le-mo-lad-te-Cha and to thy kindred וְאֵיטִ֥יבָה <S%H3190><s%> ve-'ei-Ti-vah and I will deal well עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach. with

קָטֹ֜נְתִּי <S%H6994><s%> ka-To-ne-ti I am not worthy of the least מִכֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all הַחֲסָדִים֙ <S%H2617><s%> ha-cha-sa-Dim of all the mercies וּמִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-mik-kol- all הָ֣אֱמֶ֔ת <S%H571><s%> ha-'e-Met, and of all the truth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשִׂ֖יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta which thou hast shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha; unto thy servant כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki with בְמַקְלִ֗י <S%H4731><s%> ve-mak-Li, for with my staff עָבַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var-ti I passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den this Jordan הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti have become לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei and now I am become two מַחֲנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Not. bands
